Ivory Tower Wizard Belkadhi:
Well! Here, take the Heart of the Mechanism of Life.
On the 2nd floor of the Tower the Marshlands find the Destroyed Equipment, place the Heart of the mechanism of Life and turn.
Use Heart of the mechanism of Life on the Destroyed Equipment to activate it at some time. Then You will be able to speak with the Ancient Giants, sleeping in the Tower of the Marshlands. I wish you luck.
